  • On-disk page size: 4096 Bytes (ê³ ì •)
  • Record (key + value) size: 128 Bytes (8B key + 120B value) (ê³ ì •)
  • Page ì¢…ë¥˜: Header, Free, Leaf, Internal
  • Header Page (Offset 0-4095)
    • Metadata í¬í•¨
    • Free page number [0-7]: ì²« free page (ì—†ìœ¼ë©´ 0)
    • Root page number [8-15]: Root page ìœ„ì¹˜
    • Number of pages [16-23]: ì´ í˜ì´ì§€ ìˆ˜
  • Free Page
    • Free page listë¡œ ì—°ê²° (Header pageê°€ head)
    • Next Free Page Number [0-7]
  • Page Header (Leaf/Internal ê³µí†µ, 128 Bytes)
    • (include/bpt.hì˜ node structure ì°¸ì¡°)
    • Parent page number [0-7]
    • Is Leaf [8-11]: (0: Internal, 1: Leaf)
    • Number of keys [12-15]
  • Leaf Page
    • Key/value record í¬í•¨ (key ì •ë ¬ë¨)
    • ì˜ˆ: k1v1Â ,k2v2Â ,â€¦Â ,k31v31k_1 v_1~, k_2 v_2~, \dots~, k_{31} v_{31}k1â€‹v1â€‹Â ,k2â€‹v2â€‹Â ,â€¦Â ,k31â€‹v31â€‹
    • Record 128B, Page ë‹¹ ìµœëŒ€ 31ê°œ record (Order 32)

    • Branching factor (order) = 249 (ìµœëŒ€ 248 entries, (4096 - 128) / (8+8) = 248)
